data: {2566BA}- {A9C4E4}Cheats or modifications that grant an advantage over other players are {FF0000}forbidden.
{2566BA}- {FF0000}DO NOT {A9C4E4}shoot or throw grenades at the ship.
{2566BA}- {A9C4E4}Avoid the use of constant {D67513}CAPS {A9C4E4}while speaking in the main chat.
{2566BA}- {FF0000}DO NOT {A9C4E4}evade death by means of running into interiors, or using commands.
{2566BA}- {FF0000}DO NOT {A9C4E4}abuse bugs and/or commands - c-bug and 2-shot are permitted.
{2566BA}- {FF0000}DO NOT {A9C4E4}harm a cruise in any way.
If you have any questions, please use {D67513}@<message> {A9C4E4}to contact the Las Venturas Playground crew. Have fun!
